radiographic_examinations.findings: left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) of 20% with severe LV dilatation
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat TTE revealed improved LVEF of 30%. TTE showed LVEF of 17% with severe mitral valve regurgitation during readmission. LVEF has improved to 33% per a recent TTE.

radiographic_examinations.findings: non-specific non-ischaemic cardiomyopathy with LVEF of 32% without infiltration or inflammation
